name: midcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c3))

stmt.origin: fovrnd(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2, c3, c3, c3, w0)
stmt.pretty: fovrnd(c0, (midG ` c1), c2, c3, c3, c3, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c1), cxp(c3, c3), c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c1), cxp(c3, c3), c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c1), cxp(c3, c3), c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cstrkgld, nat2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →((midG ` c1):(c3 × c3)→ c3))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c1[TarskiGDim> =]2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c1))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cstrkgld, nat2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0[(midG ` c1)]c2)∈ c3)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c1)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c1[TarskiGDim> =]2)

comment: Closure of the midpoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
